I know, but it's less stupid concept to be honest.
[spoiler]
The difference between Genysis and the new Aliens movie is that in Genysis they only assimilated one human even though they had the technology to assimilate all humans.  The plot idea of the new aliens is that the xenomorphs are assimilating everyone.
[/spoiler]
